title: Data Scientist/Engineer
description: Redeveloped platform's DNA sequencing data processing pipeline. Designed machine learning model to learn feature-rich molecular embeddings to enable robustly searching for common substructures driving protein-compound interaction. Designed new statistical method to identify binders from large-scale protein-compound interaction data.

title: Data Science Graduate Intern
description: Created predictive model to identify potential early adopter healthcare providers for marketing an upcoming drug launch. Analyzed longitudinal claims data to characterize patient journeys.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Designed neural network to classify targets using radio frequency signals.

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Trained vector autoregression machine learning model to flag energy savings using HVAC IoT sensor data. Created connector from IoT HVAC data server to Python/R, enabling analyses and model training.
